TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellStyle extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 表示应用到 控件中的各个单元格的格式设置和样式信息。

span.span: Represents the formatting and style information applied to individual cells within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许您跨多个共享的样式信息单元格、 行、 列和行或列的标头，从而避免设置单个单元格的样式属性的内存要求。The class lets you share style information across multiple cells, rows, columns, and row or column headers, avoiding the memory requirements of setting style properties on individual cells. 有关类具有类型的属性的详细信息以及如何与彼此相关，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about classes that have a property of type and how they relate to each other, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在多个设置属性的效果对象。The following code example demonstrates the effect of setting properties on multiple objects. 此示例设置中的单元格的背景色通过设置属性上的属性。This example sets the background color of cells in the by setting the property on the property. 背景色在可选行，因为上中被重写上设置属性属性。The background color is overridden on alternating rows because the property is set on the property. 该示例还确定名为的列中的日期格式`Last Prepared`通过设置列的属性属性。The example also determines the format of dates in the column named `Last Prepared` by setting the property on the column's property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用户在单元格中输入 null 值时保存到数据源的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value saved to the data source when the user enters a null value into a cell.

value.span: 当用户输入 null 单元格值时保存到数据源的值。

span.span: The value saved to the data source when the user specifies a null cell value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以在单元格中输入 null 值，通过按 CTRL + 0，或键入的值属性。The user can enter a null value into a cell by pressing CTRL+0 or by typing the value of the property. 当用户提交更改时，基础单元格的值设置为值属性或设置为`null`如果是和单元格是引用类型。When the user commits the change, the underlying cell value is set to the value of the property or to `null` if is and the cell is a reference type. 当您设置此转换不会发生属性以编程方式。This conversion does not occur when you set the property programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 控件不显示属性值的单元格的值等于属性值时设置为一个值，而不或`null`。The control does not display the property value for cell values equal to the property value when is set to a value other than or `null`. 在这种情况下，可以处理事件，以显示属性值。In this case, you can handle the event to display the property value. 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的代码示例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 在此示例中，事件处理程序中显示的值属性时单元格的值等于。In this example, a event handler displays the value of the property when the cell value equals . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2/cs/misc2.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2/vb/misc2.vb#50)]

member this.Font : System.Drawing.Font with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于 单元格的文本内容的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font applied to the textual content of a cell.
The applied to the cell text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于更改应用于单元格的文本的字体样式。You can use this property to change the typeface styles applied to the cell text. 因为是固定不变 （其属性是只读的），您可以修改此属性仅通过将分配一个新的或现有的到它; 你不能返回的对象的属性直接更改。Because a is immutable (its properties are read-only), you can modify this property only by assigning a new or existing to it; you cannot alter the properties of the returned object directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置列标题的字体。The following code example sets the font for column headers. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`GridView1`，然后调用`SetupUpDataGridView`并`PopulateDataGridView`方法从窗体的构造函数或方法。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `GridView1`, and then call the `SetupUpDataGridView` and `PopulateDataGridView` methods from the form's constructor or method. 请确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于 单元格的文本内容的格式字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the format string applied to the textual content of a cell.

value.span: 指示单元格的值的格式的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the format of the cell value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定单元格的值作为字符串格式设置的方式。The property specifies how cell values are formatted as strings. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例在名为的列中设置的日期格式`Last Fixed`到"月、 年"通过设置列的属性属性。The following code example sets the format of dates in the column named `Last Fixed` to "Month, year" by setting the property on the column's property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

summary.span: 获取指示是否已设置 属性的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the property has been set.

value.span: 如果 属性的值是默认值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the property is the default value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来确定是否属性已显式设置而无需存储比较其默认值。Use this property to determine whether the property has been explicitly set without having to store its default value for comparison. 这可由于属性具有非空默认值，与大多数其他不同属性，具有默认值，例如`null`， ，或。This is useful because the property has a non-empty default value, unlike most other properties, which have default values such as `null`, , or .

member this.NullValue : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与 或 的单元格值对应的 单元格显示值。

span.span: Gets or sets the cell display value corresponding to a cell value of or .

value.span: 用于指示单元格为 null 值的对象。

span.span: The object used to indicate a null value in a cell.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用此单元格样式的单元格的值为或`null`或用户编辑单元格，并按下 CTRL + 0，控件显示属性值。When a cell with this cell style has a value of or `null` or the user edits the cell and presses CTRL+0, the control displays the property value. 当用户编辑该单元格样式与单元格并输入此属性的值或按下 CTRL + 0 时，控件将单元格的值设置为的值属性或设置为`null`如果是和单元格是引用类型。When a user edits a cell with this cell style and enters the value of this property or presses CTRL+0, the control sets the cell value to the value of the property or to `null` if is and the cell is a reference type. 当您设置此转换不会发生属性以编程方式。This conversion does not occur when you set the property programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 控件不显示属性值的单元格的值等于属性值时设置为一个值，而不或`null`。The control does not display the property value for cell values equal to the property value when is set to a value other than or `null`. 在这种情况下，可以处理事件，以显示属性值。In this case, you can handle the event to display the property value. 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的代码示例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. 此属性采用任何对象，该对话框可以指定的值与相应的单元格的显示类型的类型。This property takes any object, which enables you to specify a value with a type appropriate to the display type of the cell. 例如，您可以设置此属性为使用的字符串值的文本框单元格中或使用的图像的图像单元格。For example, you can set this property to string values for use by text box cells or images for use by image cells. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 在此示例中，事件处理程序中显示的值属性时单元格的值等于。In this example, a event handler displays the value of the property when the cell value equals . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2/cs/misc2.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2/vb/misc2.vb#50)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::Padding Padding { System::Windows::Forms::Padding get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::Padding value); };
member this.Padding : System.Windows.Forms.Padding with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的边缘和它的内容之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the space between the edge of a and its content.

value.span: ，它表示 的边缘和它的内容之间的距离。

span.span: A that represents the space between the edge of a and its content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性会影响的位置的编辑控件的绘制。Setting the property affects where the editing control of the is drawn. 例如，如果您设置上到值为 10 个其， ， ，和中间使用空格的单元格绘制属性，该单元格的内容为文本框的边缘与单元格的边缘之间的 10 个像素。For example, if you set on a to a that has a value of 10 for its , , , and properties, the content of the cell is drawn in the middle of the cell with a space of 10 pixels between the edges of the text box and the edges of the cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在包含所有者描述行的控件。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control that contains owner-drawn rows. 每行显示跨越整个宽度下常规单元格内容的行的文本。Each row displays text that spans the entire width of the row underneath the regular cell content. 属性用于为此文本提供额外的空间。The property is used to provide the extra space for this text. 在示例中，所需的额外高度存储在名为一个常量`CUSTOM_CONTENT_HEIGHT`。In the example, the extra height required is stored in a constant called `CUSTOM_CONTENT_HEIGHT`. 此代码示例是一个更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[如何：自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行的外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 单元格在被选定时的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color used by a cell when it is selected.

value.span: ，它表示选定单元格的背景色。

span.span: A that represents the background color of a selected cell.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示控件。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，通过多种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways, and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常应指定与完全不同的颜色属性。The property typically should specify a color that contrasts with the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示控件。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，通过多种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways, and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当 单元格中的文本内容太长而不能放在单行中时，是将它换到下一行还是将它截断。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether textual content in a cell is wrapped to subsequent lines or truncated when it is too long to fit on a single line.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是包含文本的单元格，单元格在单个行上显示的文本，并将任何嵌入式换行字符显示为框字符。If is for a cell that contains text, the cell displays the text on a single line, and displays any embedded newline characters as box characters. 如果是包含文本的单元格，单元会显示换行字符行中断，但也会将任何行，超过该单元格的宽度。If is for a cell that contains text, the cell displays newline characters as line breaks, but also wraps any lines that exceed the width of the cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#074](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#074)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#074](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#074)]
